      <div class="st-content st-home blue" id="content">
       <div class="st-textSection full" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TextSection1_pnlTextSection">
        <h2>
         Donate to Shaw Trust
        </h2>
        <div class="st-textSection-copy">
         <a href="https://uk.virginmoneygiving.com/charity-web/charity/finalCharityHomepage.action?charityId=1002056">
          <img alt="Donate to Shaw Trust" src="/getmedia/55cf8824-ca35-458e-b6bc-3af72de20713/Button_transparent_background;.aspx?width=350&amp;height=85" style="width: 350px; height: 85px; float: left;"/>
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="st-textSection-imageContainer">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colOne columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn3_pnlTwoColumnOne">
         <h2>
          Creating brighter futures
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Shaw Trust is a national charity helping people, enter work, gain an education, develop their career, improve their wellbeing and rebuild their lives. Shaw Trust, incorporating Shaw Education Trust, Prospects and Ixion, also operates charitable social enterprises, retail shops and academies.
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colTwo columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn3_pnlTwoColumnTwo">
         <h2>
          Adding value
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          As a charity, we also add value to every service we deliver by investing back into community projects such as our social enterprises, national volunteering scheme and establishing Community Hubs in the communities we serve.
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colOne columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn_pnlTwoColumnOne">
         <h2>
          Commission us
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Shaw Trust works with a range of commissioners to deliver services that support communities to thrive. With a commitment to innovation, Shaw Trust has gained experience of designing and evaluating pilots to test new ideas and enhance its service delivery.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Commission-us" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn_hypLinkOne">
          More about commissioning Shaw Trust
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colTwo columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn_pnlTwoColumnTwo">
         <h2>
          Services
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          We deliver services for a range of government departments, including the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP), the National Offender Management Service (NOMS), as well as at the community level for a range of local authorities.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Services" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn_hypLinkTwo">
          More about our services
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <a class="st-callToAction columns photo-cta columns-full" href="/en-GB/Media-policy" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_PhotoCallToAction3_hypCallToAction" style="background-image:url(/ShawTrustMediaLibraries/ShawTrust/ShawTrust/HeroImages/Media_Contacts.jpg?ext=.jpg);" target="_self">
        <div class="st-callToAction-copy">
         <span class="st-callToAction-linkText">
          Visit Media and Policy
         </span>
         <span class="cta-link">
         </span>
        </div>
       </a>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colOne columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn1_pnlTwoColumnOne">
         <h2>
          Get involved
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Individuals and companies can support Shaw Trust through Volunteering, Fundraising and 
 Donating. However you choose to support our charitable work, your involvement helps us to provide additional services that help our clients achieve a brighter future.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Get-involved" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn1_hypLinkOne">
          How to get involved
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colTwo columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn1_pnlTwoColumnTwo">
         <h2>
          Accessibility services
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Shaw Trust provides accessibility services to help organisations improve their accessibility. We provide: Website accessibility auditing, Training, Consultancy, Website design and development, Access to buildings consultancy, Disability equality training.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Commission-us/Accessibility" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn1_hypLinkTwo">
          More about accessibility services
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colOne columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn2_pnlTwoColumnOne">
         <h2>
          Partnerships
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Shaw Trust provides services as a prime provider, subcontractor and joint venture partner. We look for innovative partners with proven high performance who can contribute to supporting our clients and meeting contract requirements.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Partnerships" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn2_hypLinkOne">
          Become a Shaw Trust delivery partner
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="st-twoColumns-colTwo columns columns-half" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn2_pnlTwoColumnTwo">
         <h2>
          Services for employers
         </h2>
         <div class="st-twoColumns-copy">
          Shaw Trust is a registered charity with extensive local community links. This means we can help your business find the right staff, save money and give something back to the community – all free of charge.
         </div>
         <a class="cta" href="/en-GB/Commission-us/For-Employers" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TwoColumn2_hypLinkTwo">
          Services for employers
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <a class="st-callToAction columns photo-cta columns-full" href="/en-GB/Commission-us" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_PhotoCallToAction1_hypCallToAction" style="background-image:url(/ShawTrustMediaLibraries/ShawTrust/ShawTrust/HeroImages/Commisioners_Community.jpg?ext=.jpg);" target="_self">
        <div class="st-callToAction-copy">
         <span class="st-callToAction-linkText">
          Find out about commissioning Shaw Trust
         </span>
         <span class="cta-link">
         </span>
        </div>
       </a>
       <div class="st-textSection full" id="p_lt_ctl05_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl02_TextSection_pnlTextSection">
        <h2>
         Share your views about the Shaw Trust's services and website
        </h2>
        <div class="st-textSection-copy">
         <p>
          We would like to hear about your experience of using our services and our website. Please take a couple of minutes to complete the short
          <a href="https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/BD5XB9K" target="_blank">
           Shaw Trust feedback survey (opens in new tab or window)
          </a>
          . All views are welcome and the results of the survey will be used to help us improve what we do.
          <br/>
          <br/>
          <a href="https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/BD5XB9K" target="_blank">
           <img alt="Shaw Trust Feedback Survey" src="/getmedia/6d7c71e2-880f-4d93-ba72-67867b36be64/Shaw-Trust-Feedback-Survey;.aspx?width=350&amp;height=179" style="width: 350px; height: 179px; margin: 10px auto;" title="Shaw Trust Feedback Survey"/>
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="st-textSection-imageContainer">
        </div>
       </div>
